```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(haven)
```

## Upload Pulse Data

```{r}

pulse_df = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

head(pulse_df)

```

## Going from Wide to Long Format

```{r}

pulse_tidy_df =
  pulse_df %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    values_to = "bdi_score"
  )

head(pulse_tidy_df)

```
